about_the_game:
Not that long ago, humanity managed to destroy a massive Earth threatening asteroid. The destruction of this so called “Great Asteroid” created a field of debris all around Earth, making it barely impossible to leave the planet or even see beyond it. Now it is up to you and your comrades from the “Debris Control Federation” to finish the job.

     Meanwhile, besides trying to destroy asteroids, there is also a scarab like race called "Nur'Zuma", other space ships and a final boss (if you manage to unlock the required achievements to even see it) to fight. By unlocking these achievements you will be able to access new lore that will reveal more of the intricacies that curse this dystopian world.

     To help you through your journey, the game also gives you the possibility of upgrading the stats of your ships and even buying “Drives”, which are abilities that will improve your experience.

Attention:

     Depending on the game's success, new ships, drives and overdrives may be added in the future.

short_description: Beyond the Field is a 2D pixel art top down shooter set in space, inspired on another classic game with asteroids, where the achievements you unlock along your gameplay contain lore about the current state of the world, with some even being required to unlock the final boss.
